jobs.title: Front-end developer to create event web page(s) that compliments event flyer.
jobs.snippet: Looking for experienced developer to create an event landing page that matches existing flyers and brochures.  Will need to tie in with Modern Tribe events calendar/registration. Avada theme, GoDaddy and WP Engine experience helpful. Will also need assistance with CSS styling of one page on existing website.  Job should take less than two weeks including redline pickups.

jobs.title: React front-end developer needed for B2B project refactoring, forms validation, etc
jobs.snippet:
We need russian-speaking front-end React developer to support and grow our B2B project.

This is an Urgent Job, including this weekend. See attached task to estimate time and money.

Idea sbt project on git  will be provided to successful candidate.

jobs.title: Front-end developer. UI/UX
jobs.snippet:
Looking for a Jr Front-end developer that can translate the designs mockups to code.
Experience with javascrit frameworks like Angular, Vue, Riot, Reach,

jobs.title: Front End Wordpress Developer
jobs.snippet:
My Wordpress site is almost completed. This is pending:
1. Have 8 gravity forms that need to be integrated into the pages.
2. Need registration and login page. This will be only front end registration for my users. Already have the registration plugin installed.
3. You need to have great CSS skills and have gravity forms experience.

This job was posted from a mobile device, so please pardon any typos or any missing details.

jobs.title: Ecommerce Front End Developer  - (BigCommerce)
jobs.snippet:
We have launched a new start-up separate from our core business called Reef Robotics. Our product is an underwater drone. A current draft of our website is located here: http://www.bdc-sandbox.mybigcommerce.com/?ctk=rvJFqdWSAxzBZDBVzHgwK4zXyO0BLJvU7ZuDXbg3L4YK1T3A3H

We are looking for a front-end developer to modify the template/layout to be user friendly, fast and have a modern high tech design yet be minimalistic. SEO, content writing, graphic design & video editing abilities are a plus. If all works well, I could use another part time designer to work with our team for our core business.

jobs.title: Experienced Front-end or Full Stack developer wanted
jobs.snippet:
I am looking for an experienced front-end developer to create a small responsive website. You will need to be available to work on this over the weekend.

You must have good attention to detail and high quality standards, and be able to show examples of projects you have worked on previously which included jquery or javascript features. Whilst the design is quite simple, there are a few complex elements.

Designs will be supplied using zeplin.io 

When applying, please provide some examples of sites you have worked on previously and I will share designs with shortlisted candidates before finalising the contract.

Please also let me know if you have any questions about the project.

Thanks in advance

jobs.title: Magento 2 Front End Developer
jobs.snippet: We have recently launched our new Magento 2.2.X Enterprise website, we have a lot of open items that need to be addressed, such as extension implementation, product feeds, adjusting layouts of pages, modules, and doing overall front end development work. We don't have the talent internally and would love to find out if we can use you and your team to work through a lot of these outstanding/open items.

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.snippet:
seeking an experienced, motivated, and passionate Front End Developer to join a talented team of engineers

Responsibilities: 
•	Write front-end code from scratch in JavaScript to deliver on design objectives 
•	Build web-based user experience around workflows 
•	Build maintainable, scalable, and highly available online services
•	Create server-side applications in React.js
•	Collaborate with other teams and designers to produce user experiences
•	Preserve consistency and best-practices across all our services
•	Design features and deliver code that addresses business requirements

Requirements: 
•	1-3+ years professional web application development
•	2+ years professional software development using JavaScript and React.js
•	Experience developing and consuming Restful APIs
•	Familiarity with Visual Studio 
•	Typescript and C# experience 
•	Experience writing JavaScript code and libraries for production e-commerce or web applications
•	Solid understanding of web protocols 
•	Ability to pick up and build upon new concepts quickly
•	BS or MS degree in computer science or mathematics
Nice to have: 
•	Skilled with different Azure offerings such as Redis, Application Insights, micro services, Event Hub, and Kusto.
•	Experienced with SQL and NoSQL databases such as ElasticSearch and DocumentDB and their associated query languages 
•	Working knowledge of React Native, Vue.js and Angular (2)

jobs.title: Front-end Developer — WordPress
jobs.snippet:
Our cryptoasset and blockchain startup is looking for an experienced, tech-savvy and modern wordpress theme developer. You must be proficient in theme development and theme editing. Knowledge in HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, JavaScript, and Bootstrap framework is required. Candidate must have a good understanding of how wordpress works and be able to code (pixel-perfect) the designs supplied by our in-house design team, and be experienced in custom coding as well as pertinent extensions.

Please DO NOT APPLY if you don't understand the architecture behind WordPress. We ARE NOT looking for theme customization.

Knowledge in mySQL and php is a big, big plus!

Send us your portfolio highlights related to wordpress development.

Please include the word "CRYPTO" on top of your proposal so we know you read the full project description.

Thanks!

jobs.title: Junior Front End Developer Angular and Bootstrap
jobs.snippet:
I am looking for a junior front end developer who has strong skills in Angular and Bootstrap. You will be in charge of CSS (SCSS) and front end development. All designs will be provided but you will have some room to customize/change if it fits the overall goal/vision. 

In order to be considered you need to be familiar with the below: 
Node v.5.9.1
npm
bower
gulp
git-flow

Your machine must be able to install/run: (OS X preferred) 
Node v.5
PostgreSQL v.9.4.5

You will  need to be able to fork a repo, clone it down and create pull requests to the upstream repo. I am not able to spend hours getting your environment setup.

Please include a link to your Github account. If not included, you will not be interviewed.

This is an remote position that will require to you meet with lead developer/project managers, located in Central Standard Time, multiple times per week (2+ hrs) for code review, planning, and general questions.

Project Type: Ongoing project
Project Stage: Design
Ongoing project: Developer
